transcript.text: Shalom good morning this is daniel john
lee with poor restoration ministries it
is friday morning preparation day
october the 18 2013 and in just two days
now the feast of Sukkot begins the
eighth day feast & because the shabbat
the weekly shabbat starts tonight and
then it goes right into the high Sabbath
the first day of Tabernacles I've got to
get everything ready now my sukkah and
everything else but the Feast of
Tabernacles the feast of Sukkot is known
in the scriptures as the feast of
ingathering because it's when ancient
Israel would gather in all their fruit
harvest is the last harvest that occurs
in the fall and as you can see I'm here
in Portland Oregon and all the fruit
harvest and things have been made and be
gathered and prepared because this is
the time when see all the pumpkins and
all the all the different vegetables and
everything because this is the time when
all of these things are done so I've
gotten some organic apples and pears and
then some fresh raw apple cider so
hallelujah getting ready for the feast
of Sukkot Shalom I'll be making more
podcast soon god bless
